name: Ever After High Tea Party Dash
name_original: Ever After High Tea Party Dash
description:
At Ever After High, the powerful princesses learn to take their lead in their own stories, and now they need your hexquisite tea service skills to help give back to one of the school's most beloved landmarks! The school library has been outdated for generations, but thanks to the efforts of the Royal Student Council, there may still be a chance to repair it. Prove that princesses really are powerful by helping presidents Apple White™ and Madeline Hatter™ throw a fableous Tea Party fundraiser and fill the shelves with a ton of new books! Provide the best service you can, but keep up the pace, as your guests will disappear from your tea party if you keep them waiting too long! As an added benefit of being such a worthy cause, high-paying VIPs (Very Important Professors) will drop in every now and again. So always be prepared!

Upgrade your existing staff and hire other Ever After High characters to help you with increasingly demanding customers. Move from one challenging level to the next in this nonstop, fast-paced, time-management game. It's sure to be one spelltacular ride!

Enchanting Features:
- Tons of beautiful items to decorate your tea setting!
- Unlock additional Ever After High characters
- Earn coins every time you play, so you can purchase wicked cool upgrades
- Unlock the treasure box after each round to win hexciting prizes!
- Up to 8 spellbinding scenes available for your tea party
- Available in over 20 languages including English, Japanese, Korean and French!

** Please note that while the app is free, please be aware that it contains paid content for real money that can be purchased upon users' wish to enhance their gaming experience. **
